actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-133.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations, studies, oversight, and functions to be conducted by the Committee on Government Operations.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-133) Declares that expenses, not to exceed $1,645,598, of certain investigations, studies, and oversight responsibilities and functions of the Committee on Government Operations shall be paid out of the contingent fund of the House.

titles.title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations, studies, oversight, and functions to be conducted by the Committee on Government Operations.
